refnamediv.refpurpose: Function to initialize the I2C system

listitem.para: the I2C number of the device obtained using RPI_i2cdetect

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This initialises the I2C system with your given device identifier. The addr is the I2C number of the device and obtained using RPI_i2cdetect program. The function works out the Raspberry Pi revision and opens the appropriate device in /dev.
The return value is the standard Linux filehandle, or -1 if any error â€“ in which case, errno can be consulted as usual.
